name: BattleSphere Gold
overview: A second version of the game, titled BattleSphere Gold, was first released on March 15, 2002. This release came in a transparent cartridge, featuring several updates and additions not found within the original version such as new animations, a reworked menu screen system, bug fixes and more, in addition to containing the JUGS (Jaguar Unmodified Game Server) to aid in homebrew development for the system.
